definitions.definition: An object located between two or more things and hence separating them.
A device for removing one substance from another, such as cream from milk.
One who separates; an agent performing the action of separating.

main_definition: An object located between two or more things and hence separating them.
secondary_definitions: A device for removing one substance from another, such as cream from milk.
One who separates; an agent performing the action of separating.
